root.name: Hatoful Boyfriend
root.description: OverviewHatoful Boyfriend is a visual novel released in 2011 for the personal computer. It's a doujin dating sim, which isn't that unusual for this type of game. What is weird is that you play as a human girl attending a school that is otherwise solely attended by pigeons. Go on dates with handsome birds while discovering why such a bizarre scenario could exist, and avoid being murdered, of course.
